title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.2 - Definition

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part, defense emergency aid shall
mean food, shelter (lodging), clothing and care (other than medical) furnished
to persons who are in need because of attack. Such aid may be furnished wholly
or partially as mass care or emergency financial assistance depending upon the
conditions prevailing at the time such aid becomes necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
508.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
